title: Master Chef Tahm Kench's cooking instruments are bugged

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Master Chef TK's cooking instruments that he pulls out are bugged. 

Get a couple stacks on an enemy champ and watch as Tahm masterfully pulls out his cooking fork and knife .Unfortunately his knife has gotten stuck in the fork.

replies.body:
Hello, hello! 

Thanks for the report! I'll poke around with this today; I believe this was caused by a re-export of his animations to fix clipping issues with his belt. ;-;
